January 23, 1969
MEMORANDUM
TO? James Fellows
FROM; Robert Mott
My recommendation oa the issue at hand is that
we support the rules as described in the January 10
1969 Report No* 7805 but urge that the Commission
seek the necessary amendment to except FM transÂ¬
lators from the licensed operator requirement*
